relation: Business Data and Analytics (Big Data Basics)

The program is is an intensive experience for individuals who have significant leadership responsibilities, and are looking to hone their skills in order to take on larger and more critical challenges in their jobs.

Whether you’re looking to take on a new role in your current field, transition to another business discipline or simply enhance your existing skills, a Graduate Business Certificate can help you move up the career ladder.
More than a cursory treatment of these 21st Century buzzwords, this two-day program will immerse you in a new way of thinking and give you an opportunity to practice what you hear everyone preaching.

This course will familiarize the student with data management and analytic methodologies that are prevalent across most industries today, and will suggest a way-ahead as electrons continue to get cheaper to collect and maintain.
The course is designed to provide participants with an understanding to the interdisciplinary field of cognitive neuroscience and its applicability to day to day functioning.
This program will help you gain the knowledge and skills needed to implement an effective and profit-enhancing sustainability program for your organization.
As a foundational component of most programs at Daniels, the Insights Discovery System is a self-assessment tool that identifies your preferences around interpersonal communication.
This program focuses on providing law enforcement leaders with insights about their personal style, capabilities, strengths, and weaknesses to become more effective leaders in their communities.
